mapper.select: select count(*) from product where (brand=COALESCE(NULLIF(#{param1}, ''), brand)) and ${param3} like concat('%',#{param2},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into product(brand, model, price, comment, image, saveimagefile, userid) values(#{brand}, #{model}, #{price}, #{comment}, #{image}, #{saveimagefile}, #{userid})
mapper.update: update product set brand=#{brand}, model=#{model}, price=#{price}, comment=#{comment}, image=#{image}, saveimagefile=#{saveimagefile} where pseq=#{pseq}
